fr.upmc.datacenter.software.interfaces

Interface RequestSubmissionI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestSubmissionConnector, RequestSubmissionInboundPort, RequestSubmissionOutboundPort

    public interface RequestSubmissionI
extends fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface RequestSubmissionI defines the component services to receive and execute requests.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : April 9, 2015
